ygData.subject: RE: Shining Star of Light
ygData.msgSnippet: I will agree the oil and prayer beads are a better form of gaining faction, however when I stated skellies and pelts I was not speculating I was stating fact,
ygData.messageBody:
I will agree the oil and prayer beads are a better form of gaining faction,
however when I stated skellies and pelts I was not speculating I was stating
fact, I personally used the skellies and pelts ONLY to raise my faction at
the time(it was a quite awhile ago). My paladin friend however used the
quests in conjunction with the others to help himself.


>From: Ralph Carothers <CarothersR@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Shining Star of Light
>Date: Tue, 21 Sep 1999 14:56:43 -0400
>
>the skeles I can not confirm.
>
>Oil, the prayer beads and turning in skele bone chips does work. The one
>where you get a moonstone works.....
>
>PELTS....doesnt. It (unless they changed it last patch) was "fixed" Not
>even the fleshy orb gave anything.....I tried this for over 10 hours....and
>learned the factions for temple of life ;) the prayer beads quest is a
>VERy
>nice faction upper btw. but long.
>
>Bann
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 2:53 PM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Shining Star of Light
>
>
>From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
>Our guildmaster, who is a paladin, just recently needed to raise his
>faction
>
>with the priests of Life, in order to obtain his soulfire sword.
>Basically what we did to help raise his faction was:
>1) killing putrid skellies in South Karana(at Grimrots Camp)
>2) Turning in diseased animal pelts to the Temple of Life
>3) Doing the Blessed oil Quest til he turned green
>
>These will all raise your faction there. Even I, a person who originally
>came from the temple of Life, needed to raise my faction in order to do the
>quest. But to be quite honest, I did the quest simply cause I had never
>done
>
>a quest before, I tried the weapon out like once to see what the effect was
>and it has sat in the bank ever since.
>
>Bree Wyndsdale
>47th Cleric of Fennin Ro
>
>
>
> >From: Jeff Habermann <jrhabermann@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Shining Star of Light

>like
>
> >to get this weapon as well. I am a human cleric from the Temple of Marr
>in
>
> >Freeport. Will i have problems trying to do the quest, or will i be ok?

>to
> >qeynos. Thanks
